Articles.Content:
The MT-23 is a fast, long-range VTOL dropship, perfect for long-term missions or the occasional "security" OP.

Equipped with strong SAS systems, twin ASAS-stabilized lifting jets, a massive cargo bay (able to drop payloads as well as hold them), and a fully unmanned control system, this dropship is perfect for all sorts of objectives.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The craft comes as-is, and is recommended to be used for colonization missions on Laythe, or military operations there and on Kerbin.

/Action Groups:/

1-Toggle VTOL Jets.

Abort-Activate emergency landing chutes (great for sudden landings, requires kerbals to replace).

//

4-Toggles Cargo bay lights.

5-Opens Bay Doors.

6-Toggles XL landing gear (landing legs).

DL:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/o99xdgw74a4m6cv/MU%20MT-23.craft?dl=0

(BDArmory and All-stock armed versions coming soon.)

c.2014 Mechani Union Shipyards

I cant believe nobody commented on this very interesting looking craft.

How did you get it to Laythe?

I cant believe nobody commented on this very interesting looking craft.

How did you get it to Laythe?

Thanks! I always to try to focus on aesthetics!

I stuck a transfer stage in the cargo hold (since attempts at making it an SSTO failed miserably), and then used a booster setup to take it to orbit. Once at Laythe, I ditched the IP stage and used the engines and emergency landing chutes to land safely.
It's a very smart craft o must say
